name: Xenon
description: The bot Xenon is based around the idea of creating & loading backups of your discord. Create backups of your channels, roles, permissions and messages and share them with other people. Just invite the bot and start now.

name: Embed Generator
description: With the Embed Generator you are able to create discord embeds without any programming skills. We provide full access to the discord api without limitations. Just grab your webhook url and start now.
